Member Function Documentation

static arrayFromSQLResult ( $  sqlResult,
$  attrsToDisplay 
) [static]

Parses Sql result with products and their attributes.

All attributes of one product must be on consequtive lines for this function to work.

Parameters:
<sql-result> $sqlResult result with products and their attributes
<int> $attrsToDisplay maximum number of attributes that each product will have
Returns:
<array> Array of Product
